channel.title: Pk points [317 - DeltaScape]
channel.description: can some one point me in the direction to make a pk shop charge pk points for pk items?

item.title: Pk points [317 - DeltaScape]
item.dc:creator: @FusionLord FusionLord
item.description:
@FusionLord wrote:

You have to spawn the npc that has the shop. Also add the shop to your shops.cfg, you will also need to have a p points system
i know this i have the npc spawned i have the shop set up and i have pkpoints but it still wants coins.

Read full topic

item.title: Pk points [317 - DeltaScape]
item.dc:creator: @cafoozle cafoozle
item.description:
@cafoozle wrote:

Ill try to help you as much as possible by giving you the codes. Im not going to tell you exactly where to put them. Because each client.class is different

if (MyShopID == 1) { if (pkPoints >= TotPrice2) { if (freeSlots() > 0){ pkPoints -= TotPrice2; addItem(itemID, 1); server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1; server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0; if ((fromSlot + 1) > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) { server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0; } } else { sM("Not enough space in your inventory."); break; } } else { sM("Not enough PK points for this item."); } }

if (Slot3 == -1 && MyShopID == 1) { sM("You don't have enough PK points."); break; }

Read full topic
